name: Complete Measure Promotional Bundle
description: Get the complete Measure experience together in one bundle. This package includes all of our past promotions: - This is Not a Test Booklet Offset-printed 16-page booklet with 2-color interior pages and cover printed with silver metallic. More Images - This is Not a Test Poster: 19" x 25" 3-color screen-printed poster on Neenah Classic Crest gray cover stock. - Set of 3 Bug Postcards All printed on Esse pearlescent cover stock using a variety of printing techniques: Gold and holographic foil-stamping and gold metallic ink. More Images

name: This is Not a Test Booklet
description: This promotion was designed to help clients and potential clients understand the value of visual perception and how it can effect their business. The piece demonstrates the value of design through short "tests" that explore Layered Meaning, Form Perception, Expressivity, Typography, Paradox, Information Processing and Consistency. Offset printed with metallic silver on black cover, green and black on gray interior pages. 5.75" x 8" More Images

name: This is Not a Test Poster
description: This limited-edition screen-printed poster was created as a reward for those who responded to our This is Not a Test promotion. Printed in three colors, including opaque white, on lovely Neenah Classic Crest cover stock, this poster is available in a signed and numbered limited quantity of 150. 19" wide by 25" tall

name: Measure Bug Promotion
description: This set of 3 announcement cards feature unique, original insect-related illustration by Measure. Offset printed on luscious Esse pearlescent cover stock with gold and holographic foil stamping. Each 6" wide by 9" tall More Images
